Educate the Mind to Believe God's Word 

     Those who feel at liberty to question the Word of God, to doubt everything where there is any chance to 
                                                                           69
be unbelieving, will find that it will require a tremendous struggle to have faith when trouble comes. It will be almost impossible to overcome the influence that binds the mind which has been educated in the line of unbelief, for by this course the soul is bound in Satan's snare and becomes powerless to break the dreadful net that has been woven closer and closer about the soul.
